headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Authorized access token. For details, see Authentication .

parameters.name: identity_type
parameters.description: Identity type. Enum values: AUTH_CODE , TT_USER , BC_AUTH_TT . See Identities for details.

parameters.name: identity_authorized_bc_id Conditional
parameters.description: ID of the Business Center that a TikTok Account User in Business Center identity is associated with. Required when identity_type is BC_AUTH_TT .

parameters.name: item_type
parameters.description: The type of TikTok posts that you want to retrieve. Enum values: VIDEO : video post. CAROUSEL : photo post. Default value: VIDEO .

parameters.name: keyword
parameters.description: Valid only when identity_type is set to AUTH_CODE . Otherwise, an error will occur. The text or TikTok post ID as a keyword to search TikTok posts by. If you want to search for TikTok posts based on text, provide a text string with a maximum length of 500 characters. This search type supports searching in multiple languages and fuzzy matches. Example: "summer". If you want to search for TikTok posts based on item_id , provide a numeric string with a minimum length of 19 characters. This search type supports exact matches. Example: "1234567891234567891"

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Number of TikTok posts you want to get. Value range: 1-20. If you specify a value greater than 20, this field will be ignored and a maximum of 20 TikTok posts associated with the identity will be returned.

top_fields.name: code
top_fields.description: Response code. For the complete list of response codes and descriptions, see Appendix - Return Codes .

top_fields.name: message
top_fields.description: Response message. For details, see Appendix - Return Codes .

fields.name: cursor
fields.description: Timestamp cursor or cursor for pagination. If identity_type is TT_USER or BC_AUTH_TT , cursor is the time value of the last item returned according to the current request. You need to use this cursor value in your subsequent request to get the next posts. If identity_type is AUTH_CODE , cursor is the cursor for pagination. If has_more in the response is true , you need to use the returned cursor in the subsequent request to receive the next page of results.

fields.name: has_more
fields.description: Whether more data is available.

fields.name: video_list
fields.description: List of posts.

fields.name: item_type
fields.description: The type of TikTok post. Enum values: VIDEO : video post. CAROUSEL : photo post.

fields.name: item_id
fields.description: TikTok post ID.

fields.name: status
fields.description: Status of the TikTok post. Enum values: ITEM_STATUS_HESITATE_RECOMMEND : visible to all. STATUS_ONLY_FRIEND_SEE : visible to friends. ITEM_STATUS_ONLY_AUTHOR_SEE : private.

fields.name: text
fields.description: Text for the TikTok post.

fields.name: auth_info
fields.description: Authorization Information.

fields.name: ad_auth_status
fields.description: Authorization status.

fields.name: auth_end_time
fields.description: Time when the authorization code is valid from (UTC+0), in the format of 2017-01-01 00:00:00.

fields.name: auth_start_time
fields.description: Time when the authorization code is valid from (time zone: UTC+0), in the format of 2017-01-01 00:00:00.

fields.name: invite_start_time
fields.description: The time when the authorization starts (UTC+0), in the format of 2017-01-01 00:00:00.

fields.name: anchor_list
fields.description: Information about anchors.

fields.name: anchor_id
fields.description: Anchor ID.

fields.name: title
fields.description: Anchor title.

fields.name: status
fields.description: Anchor status. Enum values: CHECK_ING , CHECK_FAILED , CHECK_SUCCESS .

fields.name: url
fields.description: Anchor URL.

fields.name: product_regions
fields.description: Regions that the ad can be delivered to. This is a list of country or region codes. For example, ["DE"] .

fields.name: video_info
fields.description: Information about the video post. Note : When item_type is CAROUSEL , the value of this field will be null.

fields.name: bit_rate
fields.description: Bit rates, in bps.

fields.name: duration
fields.description: Duration of the video, in seconds.

fields.name: size
fields.description: Video size, in bytes.

fields.name: height
fields.description: Video height.

fields.name: width
fields.description: Video width.

fields.name: poster_url
fields.description: URL to the video poster. It is valid for an hour. When it expires, you need to call the endpoint again to get a new URL.

fields.name: signature
fields.description: MD5 for the video file.

fields.name: url
fields.description: Video preview link. It is valid for an hour. When it expires, you need to get a new URL.

fields.name: format
fields.description: Format of the video.

fields.name: carousel_info
fields.description: Information about the photo post. Note : When item_type is VIDEO , the value of this field will be null.

fields.name: image_info
fields.description: Information about the images used in the photo post. The images are returned in the same order as they are shown in the photo post.

fields.name: image_id
fields.description: Image ID.

fields.name: image_url
fields.description: The URL of the image. Validity period: 90 days.

fields.name: image_height
fields.description: The height of the image, measured in pixels.

fields.name: image_width
fields.description: The width of the image, measured in pixels.

fields.name: music_info
fields.description: Information about the music used in the photo post. Note : If the photo post is directly published in the TikTok App without music, the value of this field will be null.

fields.name: music_id
fields.description: Music ID.

fields.name: music_url
fields.description: The URL of the music. Validity period: 90 days.

fields.name: music_duration
fields.description: The duration of the music, in seconds.

fields.name: request_id
fields.description: The log id of the request, which uniquely identifies a request.
